com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Map

Class ChunkMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Map.AbstractMap
      • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Map.ChunkMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ChunkMap
extends AbstractMap
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A map stores nine chunks as part of a bigger map. It also contains the entities.

                Generator generator,
                int saveslot)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a map.
        Parameters:
        name - if available on disk it will load the meta file
        generator - the generator used for generating new chunks
        saveslot -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if there is no full read/write access to the map file

        Runtime: O(c) where c = amount of chunks -> O(1)
        Parameters:
        chunkX -
        chunkY -
        Returns:
